title: cryptokangaroo
author: cryptokangaroo
content: For sale two blockchain and crypto related communities on the meetup com platform. Demographics: London.1100 and 1965 subscribers. You can send direct messages to community emails, to announce online meetup zoom conference calls with your community, or actually hold meetups in London.Would likely suit a project looking to attract London demographics for the meatspace meetup or holdÂ  online meetup/community calls.Proven (and erasable) history of events, including joint ones, for example with Hedera Hashgraph. You can customise the group fully to your liking, change the name, appoint organisers/co-organisers (perhaps your ambassadors), etc.Links for the communities on your request. Price negotiable. Discounted if you take both of the communities. Only serious offers from actual projects and respected crypto enthusiasts please. Kick start your community.
